content:
#!/bin/bash
shopt -s extglob

# Now, traverse again & find the failures; log their compilations and output to screen for diagnosis
start=$(pwd)
for file in Submissions/$1_*/*/*/bin/*AI ; do
  path=${file%/bin/*}
  if [ ! -e "${path}/bin/byAlex" ]; then
    echo "============================================================="
    echo ">>" $file
    cd "${path}/src"
    ls @(*.cpp|*.c|*.cc|*.cxx)
    #g++ -I. -static-libstdc++ @(*.cpp|*.c|*.cc|*.cxx) -o byAlex > compile.log    
    #cat compile.log
    printf "\n\n"
    cd $start
  fi
done
